metadata.title: Friday, 28th October, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify all secondary schools in Mfuwe Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the project will commence; and
(c) what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development
parts: (a) what incentives are being offered to Small and Medium Enterprises, especially those managed by the youths;
(b) what measures are being taken to sensitise the youths about the incentives; and
(c) what incentives are available for those who are above the age of 35 years. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply -  Motion (30th September)  -  Resumption of Debate. __________________________
